quote: Everything at the moment, my dear, no doubt seems disgusting. I know the mood too well. But being in that mood, Ross, is like being out in the frost. If we do not keep on the move we shall perish.
quote_letters: EVERYTHING AT THE MOMENT MY DEAR NO DOUBT SEEMS DISGUSTING I KNOW THE MOOD TOO WELL BUT BEING IN THAT MOOD ROSS IS LIKE BEING OUT IN THE FROST IF WE DO NOT KEEP ON THE MOVE WE SHALL PERISH
